properties.name: civicsage.bootstrap.data.directory
properties.description: Path to the directory that should be indexed on startup.

properties.name: civicsage.s3.access-id
properties.description: Access key id for the object Storage.

properties.name: civicsage.s3.access-secret
properties.description: Access key for the object Storage.

properties.name: civicsage.s3.bucket.name
properties.description: Name of the bucket to use.

properties.name: civicsage.ai.chat.model.context-length
properties.description: The maximum number of tokens to be used for the context.

properties.name: civicsage.ai.embedding.model.context-length
properties.description: The maximum number of tokens to be used for the context.

properties.name: civicsage.security.allowed-origins
properties.description: List of allowed origins for CORS.
